Package model

Class SoccerBall

java.lang.Object
model.SoccerBall
public class SoccerBall extends Object
This class uses Singleton pattern and represents a soccer ball.

  • Method Details

    • getSoccerBall

      public static SoccerBall getSoccerBall()
      This method returns an instance of the class.
      Returns:
      SoccerBall the instance of class

    • moveBall

      public void moveBall(int initialDistance, double initialVelocity, double acceleration)
      This method moves the ball in a given direction based on parameter input. It repaints based on change in position.
      Parameters:
      initialDistance - represents initial distance
      initialVelocity - represents initial velocity
      acceleration - represents acceleration.

    • moveBallY

      public void moveBallY(int distance)
      Moves the ball based on distance along the x and y axis
      Parameters:
      distance - Moves the ball to a new location provided it's within range, and displacement from the new location is larger than 20 pixels

    • resetSoccerBall

      public void resetSoccerBall()
      Resets the position of the ball

    • onGoalkeeperSide

      public boolean onGoalkeeperSide()
      Checks to see if the ball is on the goalkeeper's side.
      Returns:
      Returns true if it's less than 200

    • inGate

      public boolean inGate()
      Checks if the ball is in the gate
      Returns:
      boolean true or false.

    • setVelocity

      public void setVelocity(double velocity)
      Set the velocity of the ball.
      Parameters:
      velocity - represents the speed of the ball.

    • getVelocity

      public double getVelocity()
      Get the velocity of ball.
      Returns:
      double representing velocity.

    • getPosition

      public Point getPosition()
      Gets the position of the ball
      Returns:

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Point position)

      Parameters:
      position - represents location.
